T02D2423:38b-3: phra ba'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba /
T02D2423:38b-4: dpal gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2423:38b-5: khyim du khyim bdag rnal 'byor pa //
T02D2423:38b-6: gsang 'khyud gnyis med bsgom par bya //
T02D2423:38b-8: khyod kyis 'di kun sba bar gyis //
T02D2423:38b-9: tshad kyang gzung du med pa la //
T02D2423:38b-10: de yi rigs kyang rtogs pa med //
T02D2423:38b-11: sa mu dra yi dge sbyong ni //
T02D2423:38b-12: sa gsum grags pas khyab par 'gyur //
T02D2423:38b-13: bdag nyid myos pa'i cha lugs kyis //
T02D2423:38b-14: dug lnga khrus shing dag par 'gyur //
T02D2423:38b-16: nang du mnan nas bsad par gyis //
T02D2423:38b-17: rigs kyi nga rgyal spang byas nas //
T02D2423:38b-18: dge slong bdag gis smras pa yin //
T02D2423:38b-19: dbang po sna tshogs mthong 'gyur kyang //
T02D2423:38b-20: dus kyi pho nyas dran pa yis //
T02D2423:38b-22: mtha' gnyis bral na don rnams grub //
T02D2423:38b-24: sems 'di mnan nas spang bar gyis //
T02D2423:38b-25: rnal 'byor rnam rtog gcod pa yis //
T02D2423:38b-26: sa mu dra dag dngos med 'gyur //
T02D2423:38b-27: phra ba'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa yis //
T02D2423:38b-28: bdag nyid gnyis med grub pa thob //
